about_the_game:
“Wake up damn you, Emo, we have a lot of veins for cuts!”


Cyberemo 2007 is an adventure indie game that takes place in the CryCity, where tears, pain and body tattoos are most valued. You play as Emo, a guy in search of a secret that reveals the mystery of its origin. Your actions will not affect the course of the plot and everything that surrounds you!

Features in Full Game:

✔️ Stunning, exciting plot, with unexpected twists;
✔️ Many jokes, easter eggs, secrets, references, banter and irony;
✔️ Advanced dialogue system with NPS. A few endings;
✔️ A variety of gameplay. Cutscenes on the game engine. Boss Fights;
✔️ Very High difficulty. Really VERY high;
✔️ OK Boomer - we added the ability to select difficulty: Hard, Normal, Easy;
✔️ Skin of the character changes, depending on the environment;
✔️ Colorful graphics, unusual locations, destructibility and moving elements;
✔️ Sonorously soundtrack, by Nitral Music Audiolab

Cyberemo 2007, not a simple game, get ready for a souls-like challenge!
And don't forget: You are breathtaking!


All matches are random. The game consists of jokes, banter and irony. We are not trying to offend anyone. All game content is created as a banter over various aspects of life and activity. The game is filled with humor, jokes and positive. All names, titles, places and events are random. Our game is completely invented and is a parody.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
